descriptionSet.description: A list of the names being part of the film crew is pictured. In the back, a boy dressed as Lord Krishna can be seen with his right hand raised and a halo around his head.

description-en: A list of the names being part of the film crew is pictured. In the back, a boy dressed as Lord Krishna can be seen with his right hand raised and a halo around his head. (gs)
related hyperlinks: http://www.kamat.com/indica/faiths/bhakti/mirabai.htm, Saint Meera, last accessed 2011-11-15 (sp)

explanatory comments/crosstagging: Meera or Meerabai as she was known was one of the foremost saints of India and mystic of the Sant tradition. Born in a royal family in Rajasthan she became an ardent Krishna devotee and considered him her eternal bridegroom. (sp)
